segments.text: I want to find a job in your bank as an accounting clerk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know various funds and accounts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I enjoy working with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . We have a very pleasant working condition and I think we have a fine staff to work with .
segments.speaker: S2
